data.name: Hentai  ヘンタイ -  C-GUM VACCINATION
data.detailed_description:
Hentai ヘンタイ - C-GUM VACCINATION
It is an FPS arcade where you need to hit the moving targets (hearts) in order to complete the scenarios.
History: The game takes place in a futuristic scenario where the player needs to attend and "vaccinate" the characters with his C-Gum weapon.


FEATURES

- Futuristic Theme
- Complete level to undress
- Some censure

Relax and Enjoy.
Try to get high Scores and be happy!
All characters are over the age of 18. This video game is a work of fiction. All of the characters, events, locations, logos and entities portrayed are fictional.
Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
